website_summaries.verdict: A great 12-inch subwoofer to choose thanks to a great combination of competitive pricing and high-quality construction.
pros: Relies on a tried-and-true subwoofer design that provides plenty of durability and consistent use for years after installation
The conventional design also makes it easier to install in most vehicles
Maximum 2000-watt output rating is one of the highest among 12-inch subwoofers
cons: Speakers can blowout with certain stereos without the right wires

customer_reviews.title: Do you want quality? Its right here!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Look up the specs! And yes it does sound that dam good! If I was younger I would buy Three more. Your money would be well spent if you got this sub! It does handle true wattage! Make sure you do your research! Only way this sub will fail is user error. Get good everything amp, wires. I have the bbox ported box. Rockford fosgate amp R500X1D PRIME. Soundbox connected 4 gauge wire. Wired to my factory bose system in a 2004 nissan maxima with a kicker KISLOC 2 Channel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badass sub good deep bass
customer_reviews.text: Love these Subs blue one up a long time ago just got a new one for my Dad recently big punched good and deep none of that hide brain rattly bass like you get out of kickers and these are not the same as the subs you get at Walmart that look the same they are powerful the one that I blew up I had cranked up to just before it would blow the 60 amp fuse and we're on a long road trip on a hot day pumping base the entire way eventually melted the coils but that was our fault
customer_reviews.author: lowell

customer_reviews.title: Best Subwoofers For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned quute a few different car stereos sith different configurations, usually going back to a a pair of 12"s and a good amp in a custom box. I've had most of the top brands and have friends that own/owned others that I haven't. I get lots of compliments on these speakers and I would buy these again. I have them running with the D-9601 amp. The high db ratings mean that you need less wattage to reach higher sound levels. If you want a setup that can have clean deep bass but still have the capability to turn them up and rattle store windows ordrive people out of their minds-this is the choice of sub.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Little over 3 months in, and it's dead. Was using the Alpine 500 watt monoblock at 2 ohm. Should have been paired up fantastic. All amps are wired the right way, using oversized power and grounds. I've learned to stay away from Pioneer speakers on this one. I dont think the ratings given by the manufacturer are accurate. Spend a little more and get yourself a speaker you wont be changing out soon. Hope this helps someone else avoid being misled.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, very loud. Powered mine with Rockford Fosgate R500X1D
customer_reviews.text: I have this installed in a sealed box with approximately .88 square feet. I also used some polyfil in it. It is being powered by a Rockford Fosgate R500X1D and this thing kicks a$$. It is in my S2000 and with such a small cabin area, this is overkill for what I need it for. I only have it turned up about halfway and it rattles my brain. I would highly recommend this product and would buy it again if I ever needed another.
customer_reviews.author: ryan greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. It’s a great sub for the money
customer_reviews.text: Have broken in this sub at low to medium volume for 1 month at 1/3 gain. I crank it now at normal gain (1/2 way) and it is impressive for the money. I’ve had better with SoundStream and electronic crossover, but not so much better that I would say it was worth paying 4x for what I paid for this Pioneer sub.
customer_reviews.author: david singleton

customer_reviews.title: Just wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned several subwoofers in the past ( JL audio, Cerwin Vega, Alpine Type r , etc) but nothing impressed me more than this subwoofer. Nothing beats this speaker for the price. It sounds clean, tight and loud. I can’t wait for this to break in so I can start pushing it...
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bass

customer_reviews.title: They SLAM!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of all of the rumors about pioneer subs, but after reading all the reviews on here and on other sites, I went for it and ordered 2 of these, the audiopipe apmi-1500, and a prefab box. Shipping took forever and FedEx lost one of them for 2 weeks, but after I received them, I wired them to 1 ohm and installed them. When I say these things SLAM, I mean these things SLAM! After 2 weeks of break in, I turned up the gain to half and played a decaf song from YouTube, and I actually got a hair trick from these! My dad's hair was blowing everywhere! I would recommend these subs to ANYONE!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great woofer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these while my W6v3 is getting reconed. For the money it's a great woofer! Blows any kicker dvc or Fosgate p2 out of the water
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: Hits Hard!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my Audio Polk 12in 2,000 watt woofer speaker that kept failing on me. Was easy to install, took me about 10 mins. This Pioneer speaker hits 2x harder then my old speaker and delivers a much better bass sound! Rite out the box, you can tell its build to last. This speaker is worth more then what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Matsukaze3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sub to replace my Kenwood. And I am not disappointed. This sub hits hard and hits it low. I am using a Rockford Fosgate 1 channel amplifier at 2ohms, with a factory head unit. Yes factory. Made more durable than my old Kenwood. I would purchase this sub again.
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: These woofers WOOF.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted two of these in my attic (infinite baffle) pointed down into my living room. Used a dual 1,000 w sub amp to power each. You can perform CPR on a stopped heart with these. Great for the price. SUPER sound.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Poage

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to be PRO but no, it's supposed to be a good sub-woofer but it isn't. It is not efficient and does not play at 20hz as it says. As a pioneer fan I feel disappointed. It does not compare with the previous pioneer subwoofers that I had in the past. The respected name of pioneer is history. Don't buy it, buy JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Duran

customer_reviews.title: get get get LOW
customer_reviews.text: I have this in a 1.15 CF sealed box and it provides nice tight responsive bass that sounds great. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tacaño Anciano

customer_reviews.title: Tight and sweet! Love me some snare drum smackin!
customer_reviews.text: Tight where it counts! I am going for quality here and this nailed it. Should have switched from the JBL crap a loong time ago. Add a pioneer amp and you are golden pony boy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Better then I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Powered with Boss 3000 Watt Mono Amp - Very happy! Put in $20 Sealed Slanted Back Scosche Box that I got for around $20! Amazing! Whole Sub setup for around $200 with wire kit, not bad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marksman Precision Customer Support

customer_reviews.title: I had two Kicker cvr 12 and I bought these ...
customer_reviews.text: I had two Kicker cvr 12 and I bought these to play around with and let me say these hit twice as hard I have a kicker kx 800.1 amp and a raptor 4 farad cap with tsunami ring terminals
customer_reviews.author: Alex Randall

customer_reviews.title: Wow, solid for rock music
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome speaker. Drive solid and clear music. No buzz.
customer_reviews.author: Lea K

customer_reviews.title: Best budget sub. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I have this hooked up to a JL RD 500/1 running at 2 ohms. It thumps hard and sounds great. I’m thoroughly impressed. We shall see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate it is amazing ..... it was blew out after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is AMAZING. Fast shipping. Matched it with 8601 😮😮😮 if u debating stop it u wont believe it. Ive owned type rs l7s cvrs punches I can honestly say my avhbt290 matched with this sub and 8601 wired to 2ohms can stand up to any single sub setup and some dual sub setups. GREAT BANG FOR HE BUCK. Very very satisfied customer. In a bigger setup I plan on doing 4 of these with 2 9601 cant wait.
customer_reviews.author: Troy White

customer_reviews.title: pounds
customer_reviews.text: paired with riot 1100 w monoblock amp. just one in a 1.3 dampened /sealed enclosure pisses off the neighbors
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of these Pioneer Subwoofers as a upgrade. Sounds great. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime D

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow is this sub a beast I built a custom 1.3 cubic foot box and it hits all the right notes and If I turn up the sound in my car my normal speakers will distort before this sub will it's so loud and hits super hard and the notes are so clear
customer_reviews.author: Mdok

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sub hits HARD in my slot box. Very under rated, cant beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Justin O.

customer_reviews.title: Have 2 of these subs wired down to 1 ohm ...
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 of these subs wired down to 1 ohm with a pioneer gm-d9601 amp putting out 1200 watts rms and they play insanly loud and hit low notes very well down to 26 hz
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the better subs out there.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very beautiful. Probably not the loudest sub you can buy for this price but it gets the job done. Love that it's a 12 inch because it fits perfectly in any setup
customer_reviews.author: Omar Montes

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these bad boys in my jeep
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these bad boys in my jeep, I haven't been able to bring both past 50% volume for fear of the bolts of my car will rattle off! these are absurdly loud but decently high quality. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a cheaper way to get into the world of annoying your neighbors and getting pulled over for noise violations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice loud sub
customer_reviews.text: For one sub this is pretty loud!! Imagine having two!....
customer_reviews.author: BA Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Best subwoofer ive ever owned!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing subwoofer ive ever owned accurate bass an loud bass!!! For the price i couldnt believe it but that was when this sub waa $73.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome subwoofer! Cannot beat the value!
customer_reviews.text: YOU WILL NOT get a better sub for the price. Dont worry about stupid gimmicks like square or shaped subs. This has the perfect amount of bass! You will be heard by many. Sounds better dual kicker 10" L7's and it costs a quarter of that.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and hits hard.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these in my s10 I have to keep my windows open or I will not be able to stand it. I also can't raise volume past halfway, good value I also have a Pioneer 1600w amp and I am glad I didn't go bigger. Good value I recomend them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beats and hits hard. Brought two have them wired to 2 ohms connected to 2400w Pioneer mono block

customer_reviews.title: I'm absolutely amazed at how loud these speakers are
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely amazed at how loud these speakers are. I got two of them in a ported box and they thump. Very happy with my purchase thanks pioneer for building such an awesome subwoofer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the results
customer_reviews.text: They sure do hit hard. I love the results. Great speakers. Only issues I have is not being able to take the black ring off of it to put speaker covers on.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: These are Absolutely amazing subwoofers. I have them running at 1200 watts rms and they pound my chrysler 300. Warning though make sure you get a good solid box. I got a pre made one taking the easy way out and because of that I get a radle sound from the box. MAKE YOUR OWN BOX it makes it so much better
customer_reviews.author: logan lampkin

customer_reviews.title: Throwing 300 dollars down the drain
customer_reviews.text: Defective lost money and bought warranty but cant help me out. So I do t understand why you even have warrantys.

customer_reviews.title: fake
customer_reviews.text: product came in the correct box but an entirely different speaker.
customer_reviews.author: I rate

customer_reviews.title: I put 2 of these in my truck powered by ...
customer_reviews.text: I put 2 of these in my truck powered by a pioneer D6901. They put out so much bass that my steering column and steering wheel shake violently.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bement

customer_reviews.title: Maximum performance for the dollar.
customer_reviews.text: You know you've nailed it when people who sit in your car whilst you play music all exclaim some variation of, "Judas Priest, dude! That's incredible!" I thought my Rockford well...rocked. And it did, but can't compare to this Pioneer unit. I'm only running 200 watts to it and am totally stunned by the sound and the SPL. I'm not in to 'ghetto music' rap crap, but do enjoy hearing the hard hitting bass as part of my overall listening experience. 'Voodoo' by Godsmack is a religious experience with this speaker in my '93 RX-7.
customer_reviews.author: bajaman

customer_reviews.title: Completely over powered the competition. This thang bangs but ...
customer_reviews.text: Completely over powered the competition. This thang bangs but plz get the right box. I got a 1.9 cf ported and still hit the lows crisp and sharp but rattles the hell out of my dodge. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the money, these are tough to beat. ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these are tough to beat. They will take 1000 Watts each and play clean. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this sub is MUCH better quality both build and sound
customer_reviews.text: people think you should only have HIGH END TOP OF THE LINE competition subs...FOR WHAT? to custom your car stereo with bass NOT driving around competitions? EXACTLY...that stuff is only FOR competitions...this sub ill admit...as an ENTHUSED car audio nut for YEARS, this sub is MUCH better quality both build and sound, than BIG name brand HIGH END subs like rockford, alpine, JL, etc. BUT...AMAZON SUCKS at buying stuff. I had every other car audio product delivered within 2-3 days, one from california, yet amazon didnt even ship this thing til 4 days later. Ebay sellers ship better than amazon. AMAZON IS PATHETIC...but amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Domnisoru

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the bass is amazing true money value would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Speakee
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a budget speaker. The play very solid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid product for the money
customer_reviews.text: It came as advertised. Dont get me wrong, the sub is probably a 5 star sub, but either my amp is over rated on RMS, my wires are over rated on gauge, or maybe i just felt the sub should be louder. Overall, a great buy for the price! I will update my review when i get time to do a full diagnostic of my system with a different audiophile. Will get a check on my db. Or maybe i am just losing my hearing...the 2 I am running do sound good...
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: They slam hard and sound very good. I have 2 of these hooked up to ...
customer_reviews.text: They slam hard and sound very good.I have 2 of these hooked up to a planet audio 3000 watt amp at 1ohm. #Amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Absolutely Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and paired them in a ported box with a Hifonics ZRX2400.1D Zeus Amplifier and these things bump, I recently switched from two Boss subs and a Boss amp and these Pioneers blew them out of the way. So far it's been two months and I haven't had a problem yet, except for the part where I'm going to need a new alternator and to seal my entire car from shaking apart!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Billich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These hit forreal! Fell in love with them as soon as I installed them
customer_reviews.author: Zel Smalls

customer_reviews.title: One is perfect for adding a balanced amount of base to your ...
customer_reviews.text: One is perfect for adding a balanced amount of base to your music. Bought a second one and now I'm blown away by the SPL!!

customer_reviews.title: They have extreme bass I have the knob all they ...
customer_reviews.text: They have extreme bass I have the knob all they way down and they still hit hard. might have to trade or buy a sq sub for my Sq build.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best 12" sub EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers hit HARD!! I have owned a lot of subs in the past (JL, Kicker, MTX..) but these are by far the best! Just be sure to get an amp that matches their RMS and you will be set. I opted to go with only one 12" sub, to save space in the trunk and it hits like I've got two 12's! My friend has two 12" subs and he can't believe the sound quality I'm getting.
customer_reviews.author: Nfcu Visa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome subs for the money can't beat the price and shipping was fast!!!

customer_reviews.title: Best bang 4 your buck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sub for my fiance cuz she wanted a small system in her car. Does the job fine. Doesn't have the lows I expected but I'm also use to hearing car compention systems lol best bang for your buck if your looking for your 1st system or maybe on a budget

customer_reviews.text: Whoa!! Just installed one of these in my '06 Subie Wagon....bumps like thunder! Running on the Planet Audio 2400w Amp and I haven't even been able see what this thing can really do...it's just so damn powerful!! Setup in a ported box on 4gauge wire.

customer_reviews.title: So worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of subwoofers over the years and these really surprised me. I needed to add a subwoofer to my third car (already had subs in the other two). They hit deep and clean and are a great deal for the price. While I kinda raised an eyebrow at the Pioneer brand, they deliver the goods.
customer_reviews.author: G. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great subs for the price I have 2 of them and they slam

customer_reviews.title: Freaking loud bass!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I installed a single sub in a ported box into my 1999 Suburban. It's so loud I have to keep the bass turned down.
customer_reviews.author: BriWigle

customer_reviews.title: Get a good box and it will kick hard
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the price make you think they are cheap. Get a good box and it will kick hard. This isn't my first sub, but it is very good. I have 2 running at 250 watts rms a piece and it feels like my seats are giving me a back massage from all the bass. Great purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Austin Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 iv got them wired at 1ohm to pioneer's GM-D9601. They bump super nice in my cherokee! Very loud when they wanna be. You can make it over peering or soft. They're great!!
customer_reviews.author: SamWalker923

customer_reviews.title: Completely blown away.. literally. Amazing subs!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and a PIONEER GM-D9601 2,400 WATTS CLASS-D MONO AMP with a ASC Dual 12" Subwoofer Universal Slot Vented Port Sub Box Speaker Enclosure and I can't believe just how loud and clear the bass is. AMAZING! I have them wired in parallel down to 1ohm total and the amp pushes them really hard without breaking a sweat. I can't tell you how happy I am with that setup. For under $600 in total it blows away $2000 systems I have heard in other cars. I high recommend these subs, just give them plenty of power and an enclosure of 1.5 cubic feet each or more for the deep bass.
customer_reviews.author: Totes Wild

customer_reviews.title: Hard hitter
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and hooked it up on the pioneer 2400 watt amp and I have to say it hits.. Hard! I can be hard for well over 2 blocks. Very responsive and tight bass as well, goes perfect with a ported box. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: great subs
customer_reviews.text: Did a series to parallel making them 2 omhs at 1500 -watts sounds awesome

I set the gain to just over a third of the way and you can hear me from a couple blocks away. Best subs for the price.... Great quality. I would recommend this sub to anyone that wants deep clean base.

customer_reviews.text: I have had quite a few differant systems and for the money these are hands down the best bang for you money period. Able to take everything my amp can throw at them, keep it clear, and there loud enough. Sure there's louder and sure there are some cleaner but for one of those you can get a dozen of these. Don't think about it just push buy.

customer_reviews.title: Great low end bass
customer_reviews.text: Great low end bass, awesome sound and power handling. I run mine on a fosgate 2400 watt mono 1 ohm amp and they really slam the bass. You feel it more than you hear it - doesn't hurt your ears.

customer_reviews.title: For the price and quality, you cannot beat these subs.
customer_reviews.text: Leaving another review simply because these subs are amazing for the price. Dual speaker t-line box, 3k watts and two Pioneer Ts-w3003d4 12" subs and you will leave people amazed... You really don't need more then one for good bass but if you want to rattle other peoples mirrors, get two... Love em... Like previous comments, these subs are underrated and underestimated. They will surprise you and leave your wallet full :) Been running these speakers for awhile and they are still pounding...

customer_reviews.title: Tight clean bass
customer_reviews.text: This sub HITS HARD. tight clean bass with lots of thump when you crank it up. Great product, great price. Owner of the shop who installed it was really taken aback and said he's going to start carrying them...that's worth something right...

customer_reviews.text: Great Product Been using about 2 weeks now and it sounds amazing and has broken in Nicely. Using with the Boss Audio R2400 at 2ohm. Amp is 100+ RMS than max for the sub so ends up being the perfect amplifier for this. Was a nice touch.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say.. Wow this thing slams, i have one in a vented box in the trunk of my 2014 dodge dart, have it wired 4ohm to a 500 watt alpine amp. I had two dual subs in a illuminated box previously an this single 12 hits harder than they did, and also very clean/accurate bass. Makes my brand new car rattle! Lol great sub for 79 bucks cant beat!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Greco

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone that wants some bang in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone that wants some bang in the trunk. This is installed in a 2002 chevy cavalier sounds great and hit hard

customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Today I decided to put it up to 100% and not long after half a song was done playing there was a final thump and my car started
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these single subs in a ported box powered by a Pioneer GM-D8601 amp. It had a funky smell for the first month it was breaking in after that it bumped really loud. I always played it at 50-75% with the bass controller provided with the amp. Today I decided to put it up to 100% and not long after half a song was done playing there was a final thump and my car started to smell like an electrical fire. It worked great for what it's priced, but I guess the single sub couldn't handle that amp. Purchased Jan. 30, 2017 and it blew June 6, 2017
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sibrian

customer_reviews.author: alphonzo kinnebrew

customer_reviews.title: Five stars, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Originally had it in a 17x16x14.6 ported box, slapped so hard it rattled my teeth( absolutely loved it) however I drives ford ranger so I pulled out one of the jump seats and made a custom 15x18x9 sealed box. Works great still makes crisp loud bass. I listen to a lot of rap and EDM it can hit all the notes. I run the sub as well as all my speakers off a 5 channel SSL 29000 watt amp. Works good. Gunna buy another one of these bad boys make a second box to get the shaking back. Highly recommend to any bass heads out there. Get a ported box if you have the room in your car tho!!
customer_reviews.author: Cbreezy03

product_meta.title: Pioneer TS-A300D4 12 Inch 1500 Watts Max Power Dual 4-Ohm Voice Coil A Series Car Audio Stereo Subwoofer Loudspeakers / Free Alphasonik Earbuds
product_meta.description: The Pioneer A-Series 12 in. 1,500-Watt Dual Voice-Coil Subwoofer is designed to purposely match A-Series loudspeakers to provide seamless and smooth sound characteristics with dynamic, high impact bass that lets you hear and feel the music. Linear, balanced motion in both the forward and reverse directions of cone movement is critical to accurate reproduction of recorded sound waves. Careful engineering of the entire motor structure and suspension system (voice coil, magnet, surround and spider) of this A-Series subwoofer is required maintain a high level of linearity, even during high output/high excursion transients. For sound that counts, choose a Pioneer subwoofer. Features and Specifications: Diameter: 12" Continuous Power Handling (RMS): 500 Watts Maximum Peak Power Handling: 1500 Watts Glass fiber and mica reinforced Injection Molded Polypropylene (IMPP) Butyl Rubber Surround Material Stamped Steel Basket Material Double stacked ferrite Magnet Material Sound Pressure Level (Sensitivity): 77 dB (+- 1.5dB) Frequency Range: 20 Hz to 2.3 kHz Nominal Impedance: 4Ω Dual Voice Coil (DVC) Magnet Weight: 60 oz Mounting Depth: 5.8˝
feature_bullets: PIONEER 12" Dual 4 ohms voice Coil subwoofer - TS-A300D4
12" Glass fiber and mica interlaced Injection molded polypropylene (IMPP) Cone construction
Butyl rubber surround and poly-cotton/ cotton dual spider for strength and linearity during high excursion
Oversized 60 oz Double stacked Magnet and vented pole yoke for increased power handling
Smooth and seamless integration with PIONEER a-series full-range automotive loudspeakers
